Articles.Content:
I have just recently updated to 1.11.1 and therefore completely refurbished my mod list. Of course in the process I have lost something unexpectedly. A very high-quality recreation of the NASA A7-L suit used to be available for me to choose as a “Stock” suit variant in the suit picker, but I no longer have it.

At first I believed this was exclusively provided by BDB but upon removing that mod some time ago I still had the suit available. 

Now I am wondering if anyone can tell me, which other mod comes packaged with the A7-L suit? And is it available as a stand-alone?

there's one included with the dev version of BDB https://github.com/CobaltWolf/Bluedog-Design-Bureau you cna just delete evething expet the suits folder and it should be fine

Edited February 16, 2021 by zakkpaz

14 hours ago, zakkpaz said:

there's one included with the dev version of BDB https://github.com/CobaltWolf/Bluedog-Design-Bureau you cna just delete evething expet the suits folder and it should be fine

Thank you for the link! I was hoping to avoid the large download that is BDB, because for the next few weeks I’ll be restricted to very slow internet. I could have sworn at one point I possessed another mod that packaged the A7-L, but I am most likely mistaken.
